name: TFM: The First Men
summary:
TFM: The First Men is a real-time 4X strategy game set in a high fantasy world, where infinite possibilities await your very own Adam and Eve as they embark on a generation-spanning quest.

Players will choose a path through Body, Mind, Soul, Self, and Heart attributes with hundreds of traits for each of their characters that will together build a civilization. They will explore a world containing a multitude of mythical beasts, cultures, and characters while managing their settlement, conducting diplomacy, and waging war. Each playthrough will offer its own unique story and experience, with every choice echoing through the ages.

TFM: The First Men will soon be available in Early Access, with the single-player experience of settlement management, character progression, exploration, diplomacy, and combat aspects of the game fully implemented.
